column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////But the BACON MAC and CHEESE dish was the bomb! Wow. I really want some more. Like right now. Like
column2: maybe I can get some this weekend. OMG
column3: it was so good! Next up was the French toast
column5: but baked very hard. It was hard to cut through. A mistake was the cheese and potatoes. They arrived cold and bland.
